gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-041900rc4-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: Plays like native including all the bugs/quirks, the mouse pointer is floaty unless you set it to minimum speed in the game. Also beware that clicking X quits the game (that is counter-intuitive, when reading a note instincts tell you to click X to close the note. But you have to actually wait for an in-game prompt to close the note). Also you can walk through walls at spots. However note that all these problems are present on windows too.
title: Root Of Evil: The Tailor
